mapper.select: SELECT emp_no empNo, emp_name empName, dept_name deptName, team_name teamName, emp_position empPosition, access_level accessLevel, emp_state empState, employ_date employDate, retirement_date retirementDate, createdate, updatedate FROM emp_info WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}
SELECT dept_no deptNo, dept_name deptName, head_no headNo, createdate FROM department
SELECT team_no teamNo, team_name teamName, dept_no deptNo, head_no headNo, createdate FROM team
mapper.update: UPDATE emp_info SET emp_name = #{empName}, dept_name = #{deptName}, team_name = #{teamName}, emp_position = #{empPosition}, access_level = #{accessLevel}, emp_state = #{empState}, employ_date = #{employDate}, retirement_date = #{retirementDate}, updatedate = NOW() WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}
UPDATE member_info SET pw = PASSWORD( #{tempPw} ) WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}
